titles.title: Wastewater Workforce Investment Act
To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act with respect to wastewater infrastructure workforce development, and for other purposes.
Wastewater Workforce Investment Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary:
Wastewater Workforce Investment Act
This bill allows states to reserve a portion of the sums allotted to them under the clean water state revolving fund to address the workforce development needs of publicly owned treatment works.
